main event: Civilian observer reported a sighting of an object resembling a bell, moving from East to West at high speed on 5 April 1957 in Shelton, Washington.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 6 to 8 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes., The object emitted a greenish, orange glowing light., The observer speculated that the sighting was probably caused by an aircraft., The object had a tail resembling that of a helicopter.
